pageTitle: Louis Garneau Women's Perfector Long Sleeve Jersey 2 | Competitive Cyclist
title: Women's Apparel
textBeforeTable: Louis Garneau Size chart group rides, training, solo rides Recommended Use: full-length Zip: 3 back Pockets: semi-relaxed Fit: Tech Specs There are three back pockets, and reflective logos on the front and back provide visibility in low-light conditions. The Garneau Women's Perfector Long Sleeve Jersey 2 comes in sizes X-Small through XX-Large and in two color options: Flash blue and Black/white. Garneau constructed the Perfector 2 out of their Elite Provent 2 fabric, which has a brushed back knit to provide the right amount of insulation. On the outside of the fabric, a micro-honeycomb pattern ensures that sweat evaporates away from your body. The jersey has a semi-relaxed fit, so you can layer underneath without worrying about restricted movement. In the event that you wear the Perfector 2 as an inner layer, you'll appreciate the friction-minimizing flatlock seams. A full-length zipper allows you to ventilate when needed, and elastic at the hem keeps the jersey
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Natural Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg.
